title: Darío Rojas
text: Ruben Darío Rojas Dielma (born January 20, 1960 in <a href="Buenos%20Aires">Buenos Aires</a>) is a retired <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="goalkeeper%20%28football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He was part of the <a href="Bolivia%20national%20football%20team">Bolivia national football team</a> in the <a href="1994%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1994 FIFA World Cup</a>. He has played for <a href="Oriente%20Petrolero">Oriente Petrolero</a>, <a href="Real%20Santa%20Cruz">Real Santa Cruz</a> and <a href="Guabir%C3%A1">Guabirá</a>.
